definition: to refuse to acknowledge/to pay no attention to/to take no notice of/to ignore
(negative prefix)/not/no
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to pay no heed to (idiom)/to ignore/to brush aside
to look cold and indifferent/standoffish
to completely ignore (idiom)/to pay no attention to/not to be in the least concerned about
to sit and watch, but remain indifferent (idiom)

sentences.chinese: 他对我的反对置之不理。

sentences.english: I don't know why she gave me the cold shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道为什么她对我爱理不理。

sentences.english: Turn off the phone and ignore incoming texts.
After divorce, the two became strangers and do not say a word to each other.
sentences.chinese: 离婚以后就成了陌路人，谁也不理谁了。

sentences.english: O Lord, how long will you look on?
sentences.chinese: 主阿，你看着不理，要到几时呢？

sentences.english: Goubuli's stuffed-buns are known for their generous filling, which is succulent but not greasy.
sentences.chinese: 狗不理包子是众所周知的天津小吃，多汁但不油腻。

sentences.english: In fine, all Sedley's wealthy friends had dropped off one by one .
sentences.chinese: 总之，赛特笠的有钱朋友慢慢的都不理他了。

sentences.english: The bear ignored him and continued to search through the pack.
sentences.chinese: 熊不理他，继续在背包里搜寻。

sentences.english: There is an interesting anecdote about the origin of Goubuli steamed stuffed buns.
sentences.chinese: 关于“狗不理”包子的来历，据说还有一个小故事。

sentences.english: We're not going to sit by and let that kind of behaviour take place in control towers.
sentences.chinese: 我们不会坐视不理，让类似情况在控制管中再发生。

sentences.english: If you ignore it, the situation will blow over soon.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不理它，这种状况很快就会平息了。

sentences.english: People sat by idly and remained indifferent to the theft on the bus.
sentences.chinese: 面对公交车上的偷盗行为，大家都坐视不理。

sentences.english: She's all alone here, and it seems rather unkind to ignore her.
sentences.chinese: 她在这儿举目无亲，咱们不理她就显得太不厚道了。

sentences.english: I told the dog to be quiet, but it ignored me and kept barking.
sentences.chinese: 我叫那只豿安静下来，但是它不理我，继续吠叫。

definition: variant of 不答理[bu4 da1 li3]
to completely ignore (idiom)/to pay no attention to/not to be in the least concerned about
not wishing to acknowledge sb/unwilling to respond
variant of 答理[da1 li5]
not to pay attention to/to leave sth as it is/to ignore
to look cold and indifferent/standoffish
to acknowledge/to respond/to answer/to pay attention/to heed/to deal with
to heed/to pay attention to
not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
aloof/indifferent/unconcerned
to get angry/to take offense/angry/vitality/liveliness
variant of 睬[cai3]
to pay attention/to take notice of/to care for
to go into a huff
to leave/to walk away/to beat it/to move aside
to act in a fit of pique/to get in a huff/to be peeved
to invite a snub/to court a rebuff
